channel.title: We have a big necrotrend all of a sudden
channel.description: I'm not sure why, but just lately there's been a huge huge amount of necroposting going on. Perhaps an auto-lock after a certain amount of time is in order?

item.title: We have a big necrotrend all of a sudden
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

hmmm Maybe you can add moderation to everything over lets say 3 moths old? just a suggestion

Read full topic
item.source: We have a big necrotrend all of a sudden

item.title: We have a big necrotrend all of a sudden
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:7, topic:52034”][quote author=usernamelol link=topic=73106.msg826662#msg826662 date=1169877551]

Mopar made a system and it displays a little text saying its been over so many days since the last post was made.

Sure, I’ll take credit for that system

No, seriously it is built into SMF, it also has the option to autolock threads after a certain number of days. However I am opposed to this idea because some threads have a need to be brought back from the dead.

Oh sorry, today was the first time I saw it
[/quote]its on all forum software though…[/quote]
First time I saw it on here…

Read full topic
item.source: We have a big necrotrend all of a sudden
